items.name: Blade of the Bloodchief
items.description:
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. If equipped creature is a Vampire, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.
Equip {1}
abilities:
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. If equipped creature is a Vampire, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.
Equip {1}
items.cardEffect:
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. If equipped creature is a Vampire, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.
Equip {1}
items.loreDescription: 뱀파이어 족장들만이 휘두를 수 있는 저주받은 검. 피를 흘릴수록 검은 더욱 강해지며, 뱀파이어가 사용하면 그 힘이 배가 된다.

items.name: Eldrazi Monument
items.description:
"Gods don't die. They merely slumber."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric
abilities:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have flying and indestructible.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, sacrifice this artifact.
items.cardEffect:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have flying and indestructible.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, sacrifice this artifact.
items.loreDescription: "신은 죽지 않는다. 그저 잠들 뿐이다." 엘드라지를 숭배하던 자들이 세운 기념비. 희생을 바치면 불멸의 힘을 얻는다.
items.flavorText:
"Gods don't die. They merely slumber."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

items.name: Eternity Vessel
items.description:
This artifact enters with X charge counters on it, where X is your life total.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may have your life total become the number of charge counters on this artifact.
abilities:
This artifact enters with X charge counters on it, where X is your life total.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may have your life total become the number of charge counters on this artifact.
items.cardEffect:
This artifact enters with X charge counters on it, where X is your life total.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may have your life total become the number of charge counters on this artifact.
items.loreDescription: 시간을 담은 그릇. 이 유물에 생명력을 저장하면, 땅의 힘(랜드폴)을 통해 언제든 그 시점으로 되돌아갈 수 있다.

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.description: Part tool, part weapon, part of the kor.
items.loreDescription: 코르족의 상징과도 같은 도구. "일부는 도구, 일부는 무기, 코르의 일부." 이것으로 어떤 절벽도 오를 수 있고, 어떤 적도 끌어당길 수 있다.
items.flavorText: Part tool, part weapon, part of the kor.

items.name: Celestial Mantle
items.description: 천상의 망토. 이 갑옷 앞에서는 산도 부서진다.
items.cardEffect:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, double its controller's life total.
items.loreDescription: 천상에서 내려온 신성한 망토. 이 갑옷 앞에서는 산도 부서진다. 착용자가 승리할 때마다 생명력이 배가 된다.
items.flavorText: Upon such armor, even a mountain would break.

items.name: Blazing Torch
items.description:
Equipped creature can't be blocked by Vampires or Zombies.
Equipped creature has "{T}, Sacrifice Blazing Torch: Blazing Torch deals 2 damage to any target."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
items.loreDescription: 타오르는 횃불. 어둠을 밝히고 적을 불태우는 모험가의 필수품. 던져서 적에게 화상을 입힐 수 있다.
items.cardEffect:
Equipped creature can't be blocked by Vampires or Zombies.
Equipped creature has "{T}, Sacrifice Blazing Torch: Blazing Torch deals 2 damage to any target."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

items.name: Carnage Altar
items.description: {3}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
items.loreDescription: 살육의 제단. 피의 희생을 바치면 금지된 지식을 얻을 수 있는 어둠의 제단. 구울 드라즈의 뱀파이어들이 숭배한다.
items.cardEffect: {3}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
items.flavorText:
"In these bloodstains I will find the fingerprints of our oppressors."
—Anowon, the Ruin Sage

items.name: Khalni Gem
items.description:
When this artifact enters, return two lands you control to their owner's hand.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
items.loreDescription: 칼니의 보석. 젠디카르의 마나를 저장한 신비로운 보석. 땅의 힘을 증폭시켜 더 많은 마나를 끌어올 수 있다.
items.cardEffect:
When this artifact enters, return two lands you control to their owner's hand.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
items.flavorText: A fragment of ancient power lost in the heart of Ora Ondar.

items.name: Trailblazer's Boots
items.description:
Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)
Equip {2}
items.loreDescription: 개척자의 장화. 젠디카르의 험난한 지형을 가로지르기 위해 만들어진 마법 장화. 어떤 땅이든 자유롭게 건널 수 있다.
items.cardEffect:
Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)
Equip {2}
items.flavorText: It's much easier to list the places they *haven't* been.

items.name: Trusty Machete
items.loreDescription: 믿음직한 마체테. 젠디카르 탐험가들의 필수 장비. 정글을 헤치고 적과 싸우는 데 모두 유용하다.
items.flavorText:
"Until this expedition is done, that blade is your guardian, your liberator, and your best friend all rolled into one."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

items.name: Adventuring Gear
items.description:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
items.loreDescription: 모험가의 장비. 젠디카르 탐험가의 필수품. 새로운 땅을 발견할 때마다 착용자를 강화시킨다.
items.cardEffect:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
items.flavorText: An explorer's essentials in a wild world.

items.name: Expedition Map
items.description: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
items.loreDescription: 탐험 지도. 젠디카르의 변화무쌍한 지형을 기록한 마법 지도. 원하는 땅을 찾아준다.
items.cardEffect: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
items.flavorText:
"I use maps to find out where explorers have already been. Then I go the other way."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

items.name: Explorer's Scope
items.description:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
items.loreDescription: 탐험가의 망원경. 먼 곳의 땅을 살펴볼 수 있는 마법 장비. 때로는 새로운 땅을 발견하기도 한다.
items.cardEffect:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

items.name: Spidersilk Net
items.description:
Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
items.loreDescription: 거미줄 그물. 무라사 거미의 실로 만든 그물. 날아다니는 생물도 잡아낼 수 있다.
items.cardEffect:
Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
